item.title: You Won't Believe What This Guy and Allen Funeral Home Did for a Grieving Family
item.description: You Won’t Believe What This Guy and Allen Funeral Home Did for a Grieving Family I Introduction Recently, a story of kindness and compassion has been going around the internet It is the story of a grieving family and a funeral home that went above and beyond to help them in their time of need This is the story of Allen Funeral Home and the kindness they showed to one family
